mutants.code:
def is_armstrong(num):
    digits = len(str(num))
    total_sum = 1
    temp = num
    while temp > 0:
        digit = temp % 10
        total_sum = total_sum + digit ** digits
        temp //= 10
    return total_sum == num

    temp = num

def is_armstrong(num):
    digits = len(str(num))
    total_sum = 0
    temp = num

        total_sum = total_sum + (digit + digits)
        temp //= 10
